thoughts: Is sad they never got their warrior name
Imagines what their warrior ceremony would have been like
Practices their battle moves in the starry fields
Wonders what their warrior name would've been
Is glad that elders don't get ticks in StarClan
Wonders if the water ever freezes in StarClan
Sneaks close to the border of the Dark Forest but dares not go in
Stalks through StarClan's forests with r_c
Encourages r_c to dip their paws into the cool water
